function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Extended short-range aerosol transmission of the virus in crowded and poorly ventilated enclosures","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor airborne infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Prevent overcrowding, provide good ventilation, and maintain ventilation systems correctly","Technologies":"Proper ventilation systems and air filtration","People":"Building occupants, public transport users","Owner":"Building owners, public transport authorities"},{"Description":"Debate regarding transmission of small airborne aerosols through ventilation systems","Impact":"Uncertainty about the role of ventilation systems in disease transmission and potential mismanagement of systems","Mitigation":"Use and maintain ventilation systems correctly, review and assess available research on ventilation and disease transmission","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, ventilation system controls","People":"Public health authorities, building managers","Owner":"Public health agencies, building management organizations"}]}
